vars.name: products
vars.expr: [{ name = "Laptop"; price = 1500 }; { name = "Smartphone"; price = 900 }; { name = "Tablet"; price = 600 }; { name = "Monitor"; price = 300 }; { name = "Keyboard"; price = 100 }; { name = "Mouse"; price = 50 }; { name = "Headphones"; price = 200 }]

vars.name: expensive
vars.expr: [ for p in List.take 3 (List.skip 1 (List.sortBy (fun p -> (-(p.price))) products)) do yield p ]
